attributes.action: Start a petition calling for a europe wide referendum on dis-banding the eu
attributes.background: As the majority voted in a democracy for the uks exit from the eu, we should now call for a europe wide referendum to see what other europeans rhought about also leaving and forcing the eu to disband, taking with it the single currency.

rejection.details:
You can find out how to start a petition to the European Parliament here:

http://www.europarl.europa.eu/atyourservice/en/20150201PVL00037/Petitions
